title: Grant Shapps – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Grant Shapps, the Home Secretary, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content:
It’s a tremendous privilege to be leading the Home Office in its task of protecting the British people. Government goes on, despite the current political upheavals, and I will remain fully focused on the job as we select the next PM.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
